decks.notes: This deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays using low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to control the pace of the game. It aims to apply early pressure on the opponent while disrupting their plans through hand disruption and removal spells. The creatures are versatile and can provide additional value with their abilities, and the deck utilizes a mix of aggressive threats and disruptive spells to maintain board control. The mana base is built to support the aggressive strategy while providing enough consistency to execute the game plan effectively.

This deck focuses on using the interactions between Greasefang and Parhelion II to create a powerful combo that synergizes with supporting cards like Esika's Chariot and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship. The deck also includes a mix of disruption and card advantage through cards like Thoughtseize, Grisly Salvage, and Raffine's Informant. By utilizing the graveyard with cards like Duress and Bitter Triumph, as well as providing utility with cards like Selfless Savior and Witherbloom Command, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its combo potential.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Duress to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying efficient threats like Bloodtithe Harvester, Dusk Legion Zealot, and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger. The deck also has strong synergy with cards like Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, allowing for powerful creature recursion and buffs. By applying early pressure and disrupting the opponent's strategy, this deck aims to close out games swiftly and decisively.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive creature plays to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Burning-Tree Emissary and Aloe Alchemist for ramp, along with efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cacophony Scamp, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on. Cards like Reckless Bushwhacker and Atarka's Command provide additional burst damage and utility, while Monstrous Rage and Kumano Faces Kakkazan offer ways to push damage through and control the board. The deck's goal is to maintain a fast-paced tempo and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and spells to apply early pressure on the opponent. It utilizes cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron, Voldaren Thrillseeker, and Tree of Perdition to quickly deal damage and control the board. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion adds versatility to the deck. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's plans. Overall, the key concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and powerful creatures while disrupting their game plan.
